highlights: Developed and deployed automation solutions for web scraping, leveraging Python for optimal performance and reliability.
Implemented cronjobs to optimize content management processes, minimizing manual tasks and improving operational efficiency.
Utilized technologies like Guzzle, SQLite, and Symfony components to design scalable systems that improved overall performance and responsiveness.
Managed website performance optimization, resulting in faster load times and increased user engagement.
Implemented WordPress themes and plugins, improving site functionality and user experience.
Built websites using builders to create responsive and visually appealing layouts
Work on end-to-end application development, integrating WordPress, React, Laravel, and Next.js.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and deliver comprehensive solutions
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, facilitating efficient data exchange between front-end and back-end systems.
Develop and maintain responsive websites and web applications
Collaborate with team mebers to define, design, and website features.
Optimized web applications for speed and scalability, improving load times and reducing server response time by up to 20%.
Utilized HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
Applied server-side scripting with PHP to deliver dynamic and efficient web applications.
Identified and addressed technical challenges promptly, optimizing website performance and functionality

projects.name: Breeze
projects.description: Breeze is a sleek and straightforward blog post app developed with Next.js,React, Prisma, Tailwind, and MongoDB designed to streamline your blogging experience. Whether you're a casual writer or a content creator, Breeze offers a clean and intuitive platform for sharing your thoughts with the world.

projects.name: Pawthway
projects.description: Pawthway - A platform to help lost pets find their way back home. Post lost pets, found pets, and connect with other pet lovers.
